Module dunbar.c195pa
Package dunbar.c195pa.Controller

Class MainWindowController

java.lang.Object
dunbar.c195pa.Controller.MainWindowController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class MainWindowController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
The MainWindowController controls the interface used to display appointments. It includes a custom greeting message based off of the user, a display of all appointments for the next week or month (toggleable), navigation buttons for other windows, a report generation button with three options, and an alert field that displays when an appointment is scheduled within 15 minutes of login.

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      Initializes the main window, populating the Standard Reports combobox and Appointments Table (defaulting to a week view).Checks for any appointments occurring within 15 minutes and populates the alert appropriately
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable

    • filterByWeek

      public javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> filterByWeek()
      Invokes the AppointmentQuery selectAll method to get all appointments, and then filters out any that are greater than 1 week away of the current day. Uses a lambda expression to filter out appointments that are greater than one week away, as it is more concise than creating an equivalent enhanced for loop.
      Returns:
      Returns the filtered list

    • filterByMonth

      public javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> filterByMonth()
      Invokes the AppointmentQuery selectAll method to get all appointments, and then filters out any that are greater than 1 month away of the current day. ses a lambda expression to filter out appointments that are greater than one month away, as it is more concise than creating an equivalent enhanced for loop.
      Returns:
      Returns the filtered list
